cards.title: Labyrinth
powers: You may play a Shaping card. If you don't, draw a card.
gameplay: {LabyrinthCharacter} takes her turn immediately after the first Environment turn, not in the usual hero turn order.

cards.title: Giant Chessboard
body: This is an environment card
Play this on top of an environment card. Cards under this card have no text. If there are no cards under this card, destroy it.
At the end of {LabyrinthCharacter}'s turn you may destroy an Environment card. If you do, this card deals X melee damage to a target where X is the number of Shaping cards in play.
cards.flavorText: Under our feet,{BR}the road began to shift in color,{BR}with some patches becoming paler,{BR}and others darkening.

cards.title: Devious Labyrinth
body: This is an environment card
Play this on top of an environment card. Cards under this card have no text. If there are no cards under this card, destroy it.
When a noncharacter target enters play you may destroy an Environment card. If you do, that target has no game text until the start of your next turn
cards.flavorText: Stone walls heaved upward{BR}from the mounds of broken tile,{BR}blocking my path and stopping at a height{BR}of twelve or more feet.{BR}

cards.title: Beautiful Garden
body: This is an environment card
Play this on top of an environment card. Cards under this card have no text. If there are no cards under this card, destroy it.
The first time an Environment card would deal damage to a hero target other than Labyrinth each turn prevent that damage.
Environment cards cannot destroy hero cards.
cards.flavorText: ...walls stripped away{BR}to become tendrils, tendrils{BR}became vines and vines twisted{BR}together into treelike forms.{BR}

cards.title: The Asylum
body: This is an environment card
Play this on top of an environment card. Cards under this card have no text. If there are no cards under this card, destroy it.
At the end of {LabyrinthCharacter}'s turn this card deals 2 psychic damage to all villain targets.
At the end of {LabyrinthCharacter}'s turn this card deals 3 irreducible psychic damage to {LabyrinthCharacter}.
cards.flavorText: Her thoughts turned{BR}to the bad place, the biggest of{BR}her worlds, the world she had{BR}spent the most time in.{BR}

cards.title: Mighty Castle
body: This is an environment card
Play this on top of an environment card. Cards under this card have no text. If there are no cards under this card, destroy it.
At the end of {LabyrinthCharacter}'s turn pick a target. Until the start of Labyrinth's next turn, reduce damage dealt to that target by 1.
cards.flavorText: The ground cracked{BR}and bulged upward as though{BR}a mole was tunneling at high speeds{BR}just beneath the tile.{BR}

cards.title: Page Through
body: At the end of your turn put the top card of the environment deck under Labyrinth.
powers: Draw 2 cards. Reveal the top 2 cards of the environment deck. Discard up to 1 card; put the rest into play in any order.
cards.flavorText: The lonely hallways... no.{BR}The burning towers.{BR}Definitely no.

cards.title: Call In the Crew
body: [y=0.65]When you use a power on this card put a token on it. Powers with tokens on them cannot be used.[/y]

[y=0.65][b]Power:[/b] Put a non-indestructible noncharacter target on top of its deck.[/y]{BR}[y=0.65][b]Power:[/b] {LabyrinthCharacter} deals 3 sonic damage to all non-hero targets.[/y]{BR}[y=0.65][b]Power:[/b] Select a damage type. Until the start of your next turn whenever damage of that type would be dealt reduce it by 1.[/y]{BR}[y=0.65][b]Power:[/b] {LabyrinthCharacter} deals a target 4 fire damage.[/y]{BR}[y=0.65][b]Power:[/b] All players draw a card.[/y]

flavorQuotes.text: I want to borrow Labyrinth.{BR}I don't care how many{BR}of the rest of you come.

cards.title: Disassociation
body: {LabyrinthCharacter} is immune to psychic damage.
At the end of {LabyrinthCharacter}'s turn {LabyrinthCharacter} deals herself 2 irreducible melee damage, then may play a card.
Other players gain the following power:{BR}[b]Power:[/b] Destroy {Disassociation}.
powers: Put a Shaping card into play with the top card of the Environment deck under it.
cards.flavorText: [y=0.9]On her worst days,{BR}the days when her view of the{BR}other worlds was so expansive that{BR}she could barely register the real world,{BR}she didn't have to put things together{BR}like this.              [/y]

cards.title: Inspiration
body: Whenever an Environment card enters play, you may draw a card.
powers: Destroy an environment card. If you do, you may play a card.
cards.flavorText: They were lucid dreams{BR}that were big enough, detailed enough,{BR}intricate enough to swallow her up,{BR}as they so often did.

cards.title: Vantage
body: At the start of your turn remove any tokens on this card.
At the start of each other hero's turn they may put a token on this card. If they do, they may use a power.
powers: Destroy an environment card. If you do, another hero may play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: [y=0.9]Mimi... Can I touch you?{BR}Anchor you? Don't want my power to hurt you.[/y]
[y=0.9]So you want to keep me{BR}out of your world?[/y]

cards.title: Clean the Slate
body: You may destroy up to 3 environment cards.
X on this card is the number of cards destroyed.
You may draw up to X cards.
You may play X cards.
cards.flavorText: Like a gas in the air that{BR}had been ignited, the entire thing{BR}went up in a heartbeat.

cards.title: Exploration
body: You may draw a card.
Put the top card of the environment deck under Labyrinth.
Put the top card of the environment deck into play.

flavorQuotes.text: There's so much there.{BR}Worlds that I didn't make.

cards.title: Hostile Terrain
body: You may destroy a non-character-card target.
You may destroy a Shaping card. If you do, the environment deals each villain target 2 irreducible projectile damage.
Put the top card of the environment deck into play.

cards.title: Cruel Cityscape
body: {LabyrinthCharacter} deals 4 damage of any type to a non-hero target.
You may destroy a Shaping card. If you do, destroy an Ongoing card.
Put the top card of the environment deck into play.
cards.flavorText: ...the sidewalks on{BR}either side of us dropped{BR}out of existence, leaving only{BR}a bottomless pit where they{BR}had been.

cards.title: Defensive Buttress
body: Until the start of your next turn reduce damage dealt to all hero targets by 1.
You may destroy a Shaping card. If you do, destroy an Environment card and put it under Labyrinth.
Put the top card of the environment deck into play.
cards.flavorText: [y=0.9]Fields of tall grass,{BR}collapsed walls half covered in moss,{BR}the remnants of an old castle,{BR}a stone hut with a tree growing out of it.[/y]

cards.title: Tactical Shift
body: You may destroy an Ongoing card.
You may destroy a Shaping card. If you do, destroy an Environment card and put it under Labyrinth.
Put the top card of the environment deck into play.
cards.flavorText: Closing her eyes,{BR}she reached for the other worlds.
